title: Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description:
Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)

Pressing 'Add' for the associated editors should not add a hidden entry. Multiple selection could be enabled. The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked as '(default)' (similar to perspectives). Additionally, the dialog needs a width hint. It is also observed that the File editors Preference page grows in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same.

KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)

Also, entries that already exist in the associated editors should not be available for selection.

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)

I have released fixes for a, c, f, and g.
OB: The 'Add' button is adding a hidden entry when there is no selection, but the 'OK' button is enabled.
EB: The 'Add' button should not add a hidden entry. Entries that already exist in the associated editors should not be available for selection.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Editor Selection Dialog.
2. Ensure there is no selection.
3. Click on the 'Add' button.

Expected behavior:
The 'Add' button should not add a hidden entry when there is no selection.

Additionally, to verify the fix for 'd':
1. Open the Editor Selection Dialog.
2. Verify that entries that already exist in the associated editors are not available for selection.
